channel.title: Comments on: CSS and JavaScript in One File

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/01/06/css-and-javascript-in-one-file/#comment-4432">Felipe LavÃ­n</a>.
Still wouldn't be the same, local cache is still going to be faster than making a request across the Internet.
I was impressed from the cleverness point of view, not as a serious alternative for a large scale site.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Felipe LavÃ­n.

Still wouldn’t be the same, local cache is still going to be faster than making a request across the Internet.

I was impressed from the cleverness point of view, not as a serious alternative for a large scale site.

item.description: Or better yet, switch to HTTP/2 which can download several assets in parallel ;-)
